text: The 1986 Individual Speedway Junior European Championship, a motorcycle speedway racing tournament, was held on 13 July in Rivne (now Ukraine). The winner was Igor Marko of the Soviet Union. ==European final== *13 July 1986 * Rivne, Rivne Speedway ==See also== 1986 Individual Speedway Individual Speedway Category:Speedway competitions in Russia
title: 1986 Individual Speedway Junior European Championship
